content:
simulacrum said:

hm okay it updates every 2.5 hours roughly so not too surprising

Maybe worth saying "last updated at XXX, next update scheduled for YYY"?
I'm hoping to just display progress -- I just haven't figured out the best way to fit that into the database yet
I guess maybe I can just go with the simple option of pushing all of the planned benchmarks into a table and then popping off from there as we go, but it feels sort of awkward
maybe the best thing though not sure
best is the enemy of the good and all that.

Part of is that I have access to the raw log which I just tail locally, so I don't derive as much value from features like this -- especially in that features like this in some sense are always going to be worse given bugs.
